stories.text: The fact that most people expect sound and music in a mobile game is particularly problematic given that most indie game devs don't have this expertise.
stories.title: Ask HN: Why add sound to a mobile game given that most players turn it off?

stories.text: A minimal example how to compile C code for WASM target: no extra libs or tools, using only CLANG compiler and some JavaScript to embed .wasm module. You can use Linux, MacOS or Windows to build. Some help: https://til.simonwillison.net/webassembly/compile-to-wasm-ll...
stories.title: Show HN: How to Compile C to WASM

stories.text:
I've seen the previous posts from this year and the previous years.

It seems like there was a lot of unexpected things these past few months that no one really expected. Knowing what we know now, what are you predictions?

I don't really have a prediction, it seems it's easy to predict things when things are going really well, but it seems, like things are hard to predict when there area a lot of uncertainty
stories.title: Ask HN: What's your predictions for the next few 18 months?
